alert.note: Alert for Davidson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 12 at 9:53AM CDT until April 12 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Whites Creek At Bordeaux affecting Davidson County. For the Nashville Metro Area...including Bordeaux...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Whites Creek At Bordeaux. * WHEN...From this morning to late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Water inundates the backyards of homes along Hamilton Ave in the Bordeaux area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:31 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 14.8 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 400 PM CDT.
